detall.title: Sónar to see in the summer in Barcelona
detall.excerpt: CHIC feat, Nile Rodgers, Massive Attack and Neneh Cherry are just some of the impressive names on the bill for Barcelona's International Festival of Advanced Music and New Media Art.
detall.content:
Day and night, Barcelona will have the best electronic music at the 21st Sónar Festival. Fira de Montjuïc is the venue for the Sónar day concerts, featuring artists such as Neneh Cherry, Trentemøller, Kid Koala, Audion, Forest Swords, Spoek Mathambo, Henry Saiz and BFlecha, Plastikman, Bonobo, James Holden, Jon Hopkins and Oneohtrix Point Never, to name but a few.

When the sun goes down, the music will move to Fira de Gran Via de l’Hospitalet with concerts by CHIC feat and many others, including Nile Rodgers, Röyksopp & Robyn, Lykke Li, Todd Terje, Boys Noize, DJ Snake, Massive Attack, Richie Hawtin, Caribou, Rudimental, Four Tet and Woodkid.
The 2014 edition also marks the tenth anniversary of the collaboration between Sónar and the Red Bull Music Academy and, as in previous years, the Academy has lined up an extensive and busy programme at SonarDôme, where some of the most stimulating talents on the planet will be performing (Koreless, Astroboyz, T. Williams, De La Montagne, etc.) and well-known names such as Dâm-Funk, the king of boogie and electrofunk from Los Angeles.
detall.author: José María Dempere
